subject: fix: properly center delete button and prevent overlap on mobile web chat list
body:
- Changed delete button positioning from top-1/2 -mt-4 to top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 for proper CSS transform centering
- Removed inline text padding adjustments (marginTop, marginLeft) that interfered with positioning
- Added pr-12 padding to content area on web to prevent overlap with "Waiting..." badge and status indicators

Fixes vertical centering issue and badge overlap on mobile web home screen.
title: properly center delete button and prevent overlap on mobile web chat list
